column4: Hello, I'm following instructions about how to share my internet, it says "ifconfig ethX ip, where ethX is the network card and ip is your desired server ip address (Usually 192.168.0.1 is used)". How can I find out what to put as ethX? I don't even know the format..
What is the format of what they are looking for?
eth0, eth1, .. it's the card connected to the internet
